post.title: 7 Best M4A4 Skins Under $10 – Hidden Gems - Hellcase Blog
post.excerpt: M4A4 is one of the most popular weapons in CS:GO. Finding that one perfect M4A4 skin might be challenging, especially if you are on a budget. However, we’ve scoured the market and gathered here the best affordable options for you to explore. This art
post.content_html:
M4A4 is one of the most popular weapons in CS:GO. Finding that one perfect M4A4 skin might be challenging, especially if you are on a budget. However, we’ve scoured the market and gathered here the best affordable options for you to explore.

This article will showcase the seven best CS:GO skins for M4A4 – all under ten dollars. Let’s get started!

In article you will find:

  • Brief Overview
  • M4A4 | Desolate Space
  • M4A4 | Griffin
  • M4A4 | Evil Daimyo
  • M4A4 | Tooth Fairy
  • M4A4 | Royal Paladin
  • M4A4 | In Living Color
  • M4A4 | Neo-Noir
  • How To Get the Best M4A4 Skins For Cheap?
  • Wrapping Up!

Brief Overview

In Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, M4A4 is an assault rifle exclusively available to players of the Counter-Terrorist side in-game.

In your arsenal, you can equip M4A1-S instead of M4A4 and vice versa. If you prefer the silenced variant of this rifle, explore the best M4A1-S skins under $10.

“More accurate but less damaging than its AK-47 counterpart, the M4A4 is the full-auto assault rifle of choice for CTs.”

― Valve.

M4A4 is a great weapon for middle-range and long-range duels. This rifle offers decent accuracy and a moderate recoil that is easy to control. It is recommended to fire it in small bursts.

Believe it or not, rumors say that equipping a nice-looking M4A4 skin increases your chances of defending a site by 50%. And, although CS:GO skins are purely cosmetic, they are sure to boost your confidence on the battlefield and make you stand out.

So, are you ready to upgrade the looks of your assault rifle without breaking the bank? Here are the seven best M4A4 skins you can get for less than ten dollars.

M4A4 | Desolate Space

“We’ve lost contact”.

  • Rarity: Classified
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $4.97

M4A4 | Desolate Space is a community-made weapon finish designed by DryDoctorEgg and Andy. Valve released this skin in the Gamma Case in June, 2016.

Inspired by the sci-fi culture of the 1970s, this skin features a custom-painted skeleton in a spacesuit with a transparent visor at the background of a blue and purple landscape. There are purple tentacles on the handle and magazine, and some of them are holding a rocket depicted on the weapon’s handguard.

There are StatTrak™ variants of M4A4 | Desolate Space , but none of them fit our ten dollars budget. You can get the basic skin in Well-Worn condition for $5.35 or Field-Tested for $6.25.

M4A4 | Griffin

“Felix handpicked his team from operators all over the world… and while people question their personalities, they never question the results”.

  • Rarity: Restricted
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.80
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $1.74

For the first time, Valve released M4A4 | Griffin alongside Operation Vanguard in November, 2014. It was redesigned a month later to copyright infringement but not graded as Contraband.

The hand-painted motif of a griffin is depicted on the central part of the weapon’s body. The background of the magazine is light teal, and there are a lot of feathers all over the painting.

M4A4 | Griffin is an affordable skin for this assault rifle. The prices start at $1.85, and you can buy a StatTrak™ Minimal Wear skin for $8.60.

M4A4 | Evil Daimyo

“Carmen. I found him…- The Oni and The Valkyrie Part 1”.

  • Rarity: Restricted
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.52
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $2.05

M4A4 | Evil Daimyo is a weapon finish released within the Falchion Case when Operation Bloodhound started in May, 2015. It was designed by The Honey Badger.

Daimyos were powerful feudal lords in Japan during the feudal era and vassals of the shogun, who was the military ruler of Japan during this period. The author of this Japanese-styled skin adorned it with a red and black geometrical pattern and added a few details, such as icons of a samurai and a triangular shield with crossed katanas.

Battle-Scarred variants of M4A4 | Evil Daimyo sell for a minimum of $2.05, and Factory New ones – for $5.80. You can also get a StatTrak™ Minimal Wear version for $8.65.

M4A4 | Tooth Fairy

“No one said the teeth have to be yours…”.

  • Rarity: Classified
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.73
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $3.70

M4A4 | Tooth Fairy is a skin from the Fracture Case that Valve released in August, 2020. This is a community-made finish created by 2minds.

We bet this is not how you imagined the popular children’s folklore character looked like. This M4A4 skin is complemented by the author’s terrifying take on the Tooth Fairy and handwritten inscriptions “DON’T SLEEP!” and “SHE KNOWS” on the weapon’s magazine. The design is detailed with pictures of human teeth and moles.

You can get a Battle-Scarred M4A4 | Tooth Fairy for $3.70. If you are lucky enough, you can catch a Factory New variant for $9.95. The best condition for a StatTrak™ variant under $10 is Field-Tested, it sells for $7.10.

M4A4 | Royal Paladin

“This phonecall never happened, do you understand? – The Paladin and the Father Part 1”.

  • Rarity: Covert
  • Finish Style: Gunsmith
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.80
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $5.37

CS:GO players first got their hands on M4A4 | Royal Paladin when Valve released it within the Revolver Case in December, 2015. It was designed by Teo~.
The bronze body of this rifle and its magazine are etched with a floral ornament, and other components are painted gray and complemented with a geometrical pattern.

M4A4 | Royal Paladin in Battle-Scarred condition costs $5.25, and in Field-Tested, it sells for $6.10. Unfortunately, all StatTrak™ variants of this skin are way over our budget of ten dollars.

M4A4 | In Living Color

“Fight for one, fight for all”.

  • Rarity: Covert
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.79
  • StatTrak™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $5.57

M4A4 | In Living Color is an eye-catching skin from the Snakebite Case released after Operation Broken Fang ended in May, 2021. It is a community-made finish designed by kadzor and Nannou.

So much color will surely make you stand out on the server. This skin has a graffiti-styled pattern in vivid neon hues. On the weapon’s body, the author depicted a pink-haired woman in a yellow jacket and white-and-orange protective face mask. There are a lot of details in form of small paintings of round faces, cats, and icons.

M4A4 | In Living Color is not the cheapest skin, but you can get it in Battle-Scarred condition for $5.65, Well-Worn for $8.80, or Field-Tested for $7.50. Yep, no StatTrak™ variants under $10.

M4A4 | Neo-Noir

“She grabbed what she could and disappeared into a decaying dystopia”.

  • Rarity: Covert
  • Finish Style: Custom Paint Job
  • Float value range: 0.00 to 0.90
  • StatTrack™ is available: yes
  • Starting price: $4.84

Released within the Clutch Case, M4A4 | Neo-Noir first appeared in CS:GO in February, 2018. This skin was made by donschi and Blazer.

This M4A4 finish comes from one of the most popular CS:GO skin families – Neo-Noir. The weapon has been custom-painted with a woman armed with a katana in a neo-noir comics style. The color palette of this pattern is white, pink, and blue.

With a $10 budget, you can go for M4A4 | Neo-Noir in Battle-Scarred, Well-Worn, or Field-Tested conditions that sell from $4.75 to $6.35. Also, you can get a StatTrak™ Battle-Scarred version for $9.85.

How To Get the Best M4A4 Skins For Cheap?

Imagine having an inventory stocked with valuable CS:GO skins all your friends will be jealous of… Unfortunately, this dream is beyond the reach for most of the CS:GO players because the prices for cosmetic items are often artificially inflated.

Steam Community Market is full of skins that are priced too high, which is one reason why players on a budget can’t get desirable CS:GO skins. More and more often, players now use third-party websites to buy, sell, and trade their items.

Hellcase a CS:GO case opening website. While our cases are cheap and affordable, they have a high chance of dropping high-value CS:GO skins. The odds of getting a certain item from a case are shown in percentages, so you always know what you’re putting your money into.

Get Factory New M4A4 | Hellfire , M4A4 | Poseidon , and other great M4A4 skins for $5.25 only: simply open the M4 Case on Hellcase and claim your rewards.

Wrapping Up!

We hope you found your next M4A4 skin here! As you know now, there is plenty of affordable options in all styles and colors available, especially on Hellcase. Get your new skin today and show it off to your friends on the server.
